src - package src
 
src.assets - package src.assets
Asset package, contains classes to load and manage assets like sounds and images.
src.assets.images - package src.assets.images
Asset package, contains all imagefiles and a mapping table for easier accessability.
src.assets.sounds - package src.assets.sounds
Asset package, contains all soundfiles and a mapping table for easier accessability.
src.components - package src.components
Component package, contains all basic components which can be used in Scenes or for other Components.
src.core - package src.core
Core package, contains The classes that define the Gameloop accoring to MVC (Model: Gameloop, View: Renderer, Control: Controller) principle.
src.scenes - package src.scenes
Scene package, contains classes to create and handle different Scenes.
start() - Method in class src.core.Gameloop
Starts the gameloop.
start() - Method in class src.scenes.Scene
Collects all operations to be done, when the Scene is started.
startNew() - Method in class src.scenes.SceneHandler
Sets the activeScene as previousScene and the newScene as activeScene
startPrevious() - Method in class src.scenes.SceneHandler
Sets the previousScene as newScene and the activeScene as previousScene, then calls startNew() method.
StaticValues - Class in src.core
Dataclass to store fixed values
StaticValues.Corners - Enum Class in src.core
Available Rectangle corners
StaticValues.FieldState - Enum Class in src.core
Possible states a Field can have
StaticValues.Mode - Enum Class in src.core
Avaiable Modes for the Minefield scene
StaticValues.SceneTag - Enum Class in src.core
Available Tags for a Scene
stop() - Method in class src.scenes.Scene
Collects all operations to be done, when the Scene is stoped.
